articles.description: Latest transfer news & Champions League reaction as Liverpool qualify, Aston Villa lose; Barcelona comeback to win 5-4 at Benfica

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary featuring Jannik Sinner and Alex de Minaur from the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 LIVE: Jannik Sinner vs Alex de Minaur - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: A clear double bounce in the Australian Open quarter-final between Iga Swiatek and Emma Navarro restarts the debate over tennis' use of video technology.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Double bounce in Iga Swiatek's win over Emma Navarro reignites debate about video technology

articles.description: USA defender Naomi Girma agrees terms to join Chelsea on a long-term deal for a world record transfer.
articles.title: Naomi Girma: Chelsea to sign USA defender for world record fee

articles.description: Crowds gather as Lewis Hamilton drives a Ferrari Formula 1 car for the first time at the team's Fiorano test track.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton drives Ferrari Formula 1 car for first time

articles.description: Manchester City travel to Paris St-Germain on Wednesday with both sides battling to stay in the new-look Champions League - BBC Sport looks at what both teams need and what an early exit could mean.
articles.title: Champions League permutations: What do Man City & PSG need to qualify - and what is cost of not qualifying?

articles.description: Ben Shelton reaches his first Australian Open semi-final with a battling win over Lorenzo Sonego in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Ben Shelton reaches first Melbourne semi-final with victory over Lorenzo Sonego

articles.description: Former fast bowler Steven Finn explains why captain Jos Buttler and coach Brendon McCullum are the ideal combination to revive England's white-ball teams.
articles.title: Steven Finn on why Brendon McCullum and Jos Buttler are an ideal combination

articles.description: Mohamed Salah's 50th European goal for Liverpool in their Champions League win over Lille showed his "elite mindset".
articles.title: Mohamed Salah: Liverpool striker scores 50th European goal for Reds

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris tells a new series of a BBC podcast that he has "got everything it takes" to mount another F1 title challenge.
articles.title: Lando Norris 'ready to bring the fight to every race' in 2025
